effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
